Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Ukrainian defensive lines completely collapse in ...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces have captured Lisichnoe (Pokrovsk direction) – both sides confirm. Russian forces have also reached the outskirts of Severodonenvka, just west of Lisichnoe. In the center, Russian forces have captured the first of four Ivanovka's fortifications.… 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Ukrainian defensive lines completely collapse in the Pokrovsk direction.Russian forces have captured Sviridonovka and have already reached the outskirts of Novotoretskoe.Russian forces have also captured 8 Ukrainian fortifications and established themselves well inside Grodovka.Ukrainian UAV footage showed Russian forces operating on Shevchenka Street, which means a third of Grodovka has already been captured by the Russians.

Title: ↩️🖼 🇸🇩⚡- Rapid Support Forces, RSF, have captured a point on t...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇸🇩⚡- Rapid Support Forces, RSF, have captured Iqraa Hospital, Al Fashir (Darfur direction). Within just 12 hours of fighting, the RSF have captured Iqraa Hospital right in the center of Al Fashir City. 🇸🇩⚡- Rapid Support Forces, RSF, have captured a point on the B26 highway, south of Al Fashir – Darfur direction.RSF, who were geolocated to 13.571237, 25.325613, also captured the Zamzam district of south Al Fashir. Coupled with their advances in the north it seems RSF are attempting a pincer attack on the city.
